main.name: Som Palkar
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Welcome to my portfolio website! I'm Som Palkar, a passionate and skilled Web Developer with expertise in Front End Development, React.js, Redux, React Native, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. With a deep understanding of the latest web technologies and trends, I strive to create user-friendly and visually appealing websites and applications. My journey as a developer began with a strong foundation in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, which allowed me to craft intuitive and responsive user interfaces. Over time, I dived into the world of React.js, harnessing its power to build dynamic and interactive web applications. I am well-versed in Redux, utilizing its state management capabilities to create scalable and maintainable applications. In addition to my web development skills, I have extensive experience in React Native, enabling me to develop cross-platform mobile applications that deliver a seamless user experience. Whether it's crafting pixel-perfect layouts or implementing complex functionalities, I am driven by the desire to create remarkable digital experiences. I am constantly learning and exploring new technologies to stay up-to-date with industry advancements. I thrive in collaborative environments, working closely with designers and backend developers to transform ideas into reality. My attention to detail and passion for clean, well-structured code ensures that my projects are of the highest quality. When I'm not coding, you can find me reading tech blogs, attending web development conferences, and experimenting with new libraries and frameworks. I believe in continuous growth and eagerly embrace challenges that push the boundaries of my skills. Thank you for visiting my portfolio website. Feel free to explore my projects and don't hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions or exciting opportunities. Let's create exceptional digital experiences together!

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the Them as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Som is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
